Monthly closing workflow for TBWA\SMP and OMC Finance team.
Tasks include: - Payroll & Personnel - Tax & Provisions - Rent & Leases - WIPDO Management - Accruals & Amortization - Trial Balance - Final Reconciliations
Stage Flow: Preparation → Review → Approval → Execute → Close

BIR (Bureau of Internal Revenue) tax filing compliance workflow.
Forms include: - 1601-C (Monthly Withholding Tax) - 0619-E (Expanded Withholding Tax) - 2550M (Monthly VAT) - 2550Q (Quarterly VAT) - 1702Q (Quarterly Income Tax) - 1601-EQ (Quarterly Withholding) - 1604-E (Annual Info Return)
Stage Flow: Preparation → Review → Approval → Execute/File/Pay → Close
Process Steps: 1. Preparation – Finance Supervisor (BOM) 2. Report Approval – Senior Finance Manager (RIM) 3. Payment Approval – Finance Director (CKVC) 4. Filing & Payment – Finance Supervisor (BOM)
